resources.string: greenDAO is a light & fast ORM for Android that maps objects to SQLite databases. Being highly optimized for Android, greenDAO offers great performance and consumes minimal memory.

Glide is a fast and efficient open source media management and image loading framework for Android that wraps media decoding, memory and disk caching, and resource pooling into a simple and easy to use interface.
An HTTP client for Android, Kotlin, and Java
AgentWeb is an Android WebView based, extremely easy to use and powerful library.
Android-skin-support is an easy to use dynamic skin framework for Android, Only one line of code to integrate it.

Gson is a Java library that can be used to convert Java Objects into their JSON representation. It can also be used to convert a JSON string to an equivalent Java object. Gson can work with arbitrary Java objects including pre-existing objects that you do not have source-code of.

Fastjson is a Java library that can be used to convert Java Objects into their JSON representation. It can also be used to convert a JSON string to an equivalent Java object. Fastjson can work with arbitrary Java objects including pre-existing objects that you do not have source-code of.
Event bus for Android and Java that simplifies communication between Activities, Fragments, Threads, Services, etc. Less code, better quality.
jsoup is a Java library for working with real-world HTML. It provides a very convenient API for extracting and manipulating data, using the best of DOM, CSS, and jquery-like methods.
A html parser with xpath base on Jsoup and Antlr4.Maybe it is the best in java,Just try it.
A port of HtmlUnit to Android (currently based on HtmlUnit 2.30)
NiceSpinner is a re-implementation of the default Android\'s spinner, with a nice arrow animation and a different way to display its content.
Field and method binding for Android views which uses annotation processing to generate boilerplate code for you.
This library aims to overcome the limitations of Toasts and Snackbars, while reducing the complexity of your layouts.

Yet another open source color picker for Android. So, why should you use this color picker? It is highly customizable and easy to use. You can simply add the ColorPreference to your preferences and a beautiful color picker dialog will be displayed without additional code. The color picker supports alpha and allows you to set your own presets.

This library allows you to include vector icons everywhere in your project. No limits are given. Scale with no limit, use any color at any time, provide a contour, and many additional customizations...
Lightweight Android library to parse RSS 2.0 feeds.
